text: Derek Curtis Bok (born March 22, 1930) is an American lawyer and educator. He was the Harvard University from 1971 through 1991 and again from 2006 to 2007. Bok was born in Bryn Mawr, Pennsylvania. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:Living people Category:Educators from Pennsylvania Category:Lawyers from Pennsylvania Category:People from Bryn Mawr, Pennsylvania Category:Writers from Pennsylvania
title: Derek Bok
